name: Technology
description: Projects related to technology and innovation

name: Art
description: Creative projects in the field of art

name: Startup
description: Startup is a new business venture.

name: Social Causes
description: A campaign to raise money for a charity or non-profit organization. Or you could use it to finance a community project, such as a playground or public park

name: Personal Projects
description: Personal projects. For example, you could use it to finance a trip, pay for medical treatment, or even fund your childs education.

name: Risky Ventures
description: you have an idea for a new product or service that you think could be successful, but too risky for traditional investors.
